name: A Shadow of Thoughts
description:
He must find himself through the shadows lurking within.

Discover who you are. You woke up in the woods with no memory of how you got there or what your past life was. However, this world is not right. The regular rules do not apply here and logic cannot explain what happens around you. As you wander to discover yourself in a strange, empty world, the past lurks in the shadows around to remind of the darkness stuck inside of us all.

A Shadow of Thoughts is a 2D psychological thriller with platforming and puzzle elements. This game is based off a short story that I wrote, and the main focus is on the story and the main character as they navigate through the mysterious adventure the world drags them through.
